post.summary: Send a notification to a user via email, Telegram, or push
post.description: Delivers notifications through specified channels including email, Telegram, and push notifications
Creates a new user account and returns user details with authentication tokens

400.description: Invalid input data or email already exists

post.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns authentication tokens
Authenticates users through Telegram integration and creates account if needed
Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user
Retrieves detailed user information by user ID
Retrieves user information using their Telegram ID
Retrieves comprehensive learning statistics for a user including progress, streaks, and performance metrics
Retrieves user preferences and configuration settings

post.description: Updates user preferences and configuration settings
Creates a new flashcard with front/back content, optional explanation, examples, and tags

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of user cards with optional filtering by tag and search term
Retrieves detailed information for a specific card by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing card with new content, tags, or difficulty level

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to update

delete.description: Permanently removes a card from the user's collection

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to delete

get.description: Retrieves cards that are due for review based on the Leitner spaced repetition algorithm

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of cards to return

post.summary: Submit review result for a card
post.description: Records the review result and updates the card's Leitner box and next review date

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: ID of the card being reviewed

post.description: Initiates a new spaced repetition study session with selected cards

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive details of a study session including progress and submitted answers

post.description: Completes a study session and calculates final statistics and performance metrics

get.summary: Get next card for this session
get.description: Retrieves the next card to be studied using spaced repetition algorithm

404.description: Session not found or no more cards

post.summary: Submit an answer for a card in the session
post.description: Records user response and updates spaced repetition scheduling based on answer quality

post.summary: Score pronunciation audio for a word or phrase
post.description: Analyzes audio pronunciation and provides scoring and feedback (currently placeholder implementation)
Uses AI to generate contextual example sentences for vocabulary learning

post.summary: Generate explanation for a word within context
post.description: Provides AI-generated explanations for words based on their contextual usage
Uses AI to generate contextually appropriate synonyms for vocabulary expansion
Provides AI-powered recommendations for optimizing spaced repetition scheduling based on user performance
Generates AI-powered personalized study recommendations based on user learning patterns and preferences

post.summary: Explain an error or mistake to the user
post.description: Provides AI-generated explanations for user errors to help improve learning and understanding
Processes incoming webhook events from Telegram Bot API
Authenticates users through Telegram mini-app integration

get.description: Returns detailed analytics about user learning progress including cards learned, success rates, and time spent

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to get progress for

get.description: Returns user activity data including study sessions, time patterns, and engagement metrics

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to get activity for

get.description: Returns overall application statistics including total users, cards, sessions, and platform metrics
Returns detailed performance metrics for a specific card including success rates, difficulty trends, and user feedback

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: Card ID to get performance for

get.description: Returns user retention metrics including streak data, learning consistency, and engagement patterns

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to get retention data for

get.description: Retrieves a complete list of all users in the system (requires admin privileges)
Retrieves detailed information about a specific user including admin-only data

post.description: Bans a user from accessing the platform (requires admin privileges)
Removes the ban from a user account (requires admin privileges)

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive system statistics including user counts, performance metrics, and platform health data

userId.description: ID of the user to send the notification to

message.example: Your daily study reminder: Practice your flashcards!

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

data.description: Response data containing user and tokens

front.description: Front side content of the flashcard

back.description: Back side content of the flashcard (answer)
back.example: A pleasant surprise; finding something good without looking for it

explanation.description: Additional explanation for the card content
explanation.example: Serendipity comes from a Persian fairy tale about princes who made discoveries by accident

example: It was pure serendipity that led to their meeting.
The discovery was a result of serendipity.

front.description: Front side content of the flashcard

back.description: Back side content of the flashcard (answer)
back.example: A pleasant surprise; finding something good without looking for it

explanation.description: Additional explanation for the card content
explanation.example: Serendipity comes from a Persian fairy tale about princes who made discoveries by accident

example: It was pure serendipity that led to their meeting.
The discovery was a result of serendipity.

selfRating.description: User self-assessment difficulty rating (1=very hard, 5=very easy)

limit.description: Maximum number of cards in this session

cardId.description: ID of the card being answered

timeSpent.description: Time spent on this card in seconds

word.description: The word or phrase to score pronunciation for

audioBase64.description: Base64 encoded audio data of the pronunciation attempt

language.description: Language of the word being pronounced

context.description: Context or word for which to generate an example sentence
context.example: The word "serendipity" in a literary context

word.description: The word to generate an explanation for

context.description: Context in which the word appears
context.example: It was pure serendipity that led to their meeting.

word.description: The word to generate synonyms for

userId.description: User ID to generate recommendations for

limit.description: Maximum number of recommendations to return

error.description: The error or mistake made by the user
error.example: I said "I have ate" instead of "I have eaten"

context.example: This was in a past tense exercise about irregular verbs

message.description: Telegram message object containing update data
